text: The MTV Video Music Award for Best K-Pop Video award was first introduced to the MTV Music Video Awards in 2019. == Recipients == {| class="wikitable sortable" ! scope="col" style="width:5px;" | Year ! scope="col" style="width:195px;" | Winner(s) ! scope="col" class="unsortable" | Nominees ! scope="col" class="unsortable" | Ref. |- ! scope="row" | | BTS – "Boy with Luv" | * Blackpink – "Kill This Love" * Exo – "Tempo" * Monsta X (featuring French Montana) – "Who Do U Love?" * NCT 127 – "Regular" * TXT – "Cat & Dog" | style="text-align:center;" | |- ! scope="row" | | BTS – "On" | *Exo – "Obsession" *(G)I-dle – "Oh My God" *Monsta X – "Someone's Someone" *Red Velvet – "Psycho" *TXT – "9 and Three Quarters (Run Away)" | style="text- align:center;" | |- |} == References == Category:MTV Video Music Awards Category:Music video awards Category:Awards established in 2019
title: MTV Video Music Award for Best K-Pop Video
